comments_since_last_sample.body: I love ur vids but man, those baggy jeans style...🤢 They only work with skater style for me

Where I'm from I hardly see guys wear turtleneck sweaters or Chelsea boots, lots of guys wearing ripped jeans with socks and slides. Jose's selection of outfits in this vid is great as an alternative no doubt but the others are still good (I'm not too fond of ripped jeans though). But as you said Jose we shouldn't get rid of the older stuff,  these are a nice update to one's wardrobe. Keep up the good work man 👍
The quality of his vids went down. He acts like a crack head trying to sell candy on the subway to feed his habit but lying and telling people it's to pay for childrens sports uniforms lol.
Strongly agree with everything said in this video :)
great video bro. showing better alternatives 👌
I started wearing lace up boots and shirt jackets 4 years ago. Guess I was ahead of the curve.
